courses.p1:
This course is designed to help you master frontend development, covering
everything from basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to advanced frameworks like
React. You’ll learn how to create responsive, dynamic, and visually appealing web
applications using modern technologies.
courses.p2:
By the end of the course, you will be able to build modern, interactive websites
and applications, preparing you for real-world projects or job opportunities in
the field of web development.
courses.name: Frontend Development Course

ul.li: Fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Responsive design with Flexbox and Grid
JavaScript ES6+ and DOM manipulation
Working with APIs and asynchronous JavaScript
Advanced concepts in React, including hooks and state management
Web performance optimization and best coding practices

courses.name: Backend Development Course (Python)
courses.p1:
This course will teach you how to build powerful and scalable backend systems
using Python. You will learn how to work with databases, create APIs, and
develop secure, high-performance web applications. The course covers both
fundamental and advanced backend development concepts.
courses.p2:
By the end of the course, you will be able to build efficient, scalable backend
systems and confidently develop web applications using Python.

ul.li: Python fundamentals for backend development
Working with databases (SQL and NoSQL)
Building RESTful APIs using FastAPI or Flask
Authentication and user management
Deployment and server management
Security best practices and performance optimization
HTML, CSS va JavaScript asoslari
Flexbox va Grid yordamida moslashuvchan dizayn yaratish
JavaScript ES6+ va DOM bilan ishlash
API va asinxron JavaScript
React’ning ilg‘or tushunchalari: hook’lar va state boshqaruvi
Veb-sahifalar tezligini optimallashtirish va eng yaxshi kod yozish usullari
